info.summary:
David DeMers works as a David Demers, Avicon\'s President and Co-founder, is responsible for the thought leadership of the firm and its clients. Dave has a unique understanding of supply chain management discipline, allowing him to ensure that supply chain best practices are integrated with leading-edge technologies.
